languages.text: "Я думаю, все дело в лизоблюдстве. Лизоблюдстве и трусости. Порой гонцы оказываются на виселице в первую очередь — а туда никто не торопится".
"It all comes down to sycophancy. Sycophancy and cowardice. It is often the messengers who are first in line for the gallows — and no one is ever in a hurry to join that queue."
languages.original_text: "Я думаю, все дело в лизоблюдстве. Лизоблюдстве и трусости. Порой гонцы оказываются на виселице в первую очередь — а туда никто не торопится".

traits.locale_text: "It all comes down to sycophancy. Sycophancy and cowardice. It is often the messengers who are first in line for the gallows — and no one is ever in a hurry to join that queue."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “这一切都是阿谀奉承所造成的恶果。阿谀奉承，还有懦弱，因为说出事实的人往往是第一个被送上绞架的，没人会急着被套上绞索。”
languages.original_text: "It all comes down to sycophancy. Sycophancy and cowardice. It is often the messengers who are first in line for the gallows — and no one is ever in a hurry to join that queue."

traits.locale_text: “这一切都是阿谀奉承所造成的恶果。阿谀奉承，还有懦弱，因为说出事实的人往往是第一个被送上绞架的，没人会急着被套上绞索。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Tout ça, c'est la faute de la flagornerie. De la flagornerie, et de la couardise. Le messager est souvent le premier envoyé à la potence... Autant dire que personne ne voit ça comme un privilège. »
languages.original_text: "It all comes down to sycophancy. Sycophancy and cowardice. It is often the messengers who are first in line for the gallows — and no one is ever in a hurry to join that queue."

traits.locale_text: « Tout ça, c'est la faute de la flagornerie. De la flagornerie, et de la couardise. Le messager est souvent le premier envoyé à la potence... Autant dire que personne ne voit ça comme un privilège. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Im Grunde ist es schlicht Speichelleckerei. Speichelleckerei und Feigheit. Es sind oft die Boten, die ganz vorne in der Warteschlange für den Galgen stehen — und niemand ist erpicht darauf, sich einzureihen."
languages.original_text: "It all comes down to sycophancy. Sycophancy and cowardice. It is often the messengers who are first in line for the gallows — and no one is ever in a hurry to join that queue."

traits.locale_text: "Im Grunde ist es schlicht Speichelleckerei. Speichelleckerei und Feigheit. Es sind oft die Boten, die ganz vorne in der Warteschlange für den Galgen stehen — und niemand ist erpicht darauf, sich einzureihen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「要は媚びへつらい、ということです。へつらいと臆病。多くの場合、へつらいは絞首台行きを真っ先に告げる使者となり…そして、急いで列に並ぼうとする者は誰もいないのです」
languages.original_text: "It all comes down to sycophancy. Sycophancy and cowardice. It is often the messengers who are first in line for the gallows — and no one is ever in a hurry to join that queue."

traits.locale_text: 「要は媚びへつらい、ということです。へつらいと臆病。多くの場合、へつらいは絞首台行きを真っ先に告げる使者となり…そして、急いで列に並ぼうとする者は誰もいないのです」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Todo es cuestión de servilismo. Servilismo y cobardía. Los mensajeros suelen ser los primeros en subir al patíbulo... y nadie tiene prisa por unirse a esa cola».
languages.original_text: "It all comes down to sycophancy. Sycophancy and cowardice. It is often the messengers who are first in line for the gallows — and no one is ever in a hurry to join that queue."

traits.locale_text: «Todo es cuestión de servilismo. Servilismo y cobardía. Los mensajeros suelen ser los primeros en subir al patíbulo... y nadie tiene prisa por unirse a esa cola».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "It all comes down to sycophancy. Sycophancy and cowardice. It is often the messengers who are first in line for the gallows — and no one is ever in a hurry to join that queue."

languages.text: "Her şey, dalkavukluk ve hatta korkaklık meselesidir. Dar ağacını ilk boylayanlar genelde elçiler olur, kimse de sıradaki olmak istemez."
languages.original_text: "It all comes down to sycophancy. Sycophancy and cowardice. It is often the messengers who are first in line for the gallows — and no one is ever in a hurry to join that queue."
